content: I'm looking to explore career opportunities in data science. I recently completed my Master's degree in Data Science from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, but I'd like to know more about the industry trends and job requirements. By the way, my strong foundation in computer science from my undergraduate studies at the University of Mumbai, where I graduated with a First-Class distinction has helped me a lot in my data science journey so far. Can you suggest some popular data science job roles and their average salaries in the US?
